name: js-given-root
description: JS GIVEN ROOT DO NOT PUBLISH

scripts.lint: check-node-version -q --node '< 5.0' || (echo "Don't worry, ESLint takes some time ..." && eslint . ./)
scripts.lintFix: check-node-version -q --node '< 5.0' || (echo "Don't worry, ESLint takes some time ..." && eslint --fix . ./)
scripts.install: npm run installJsGiven && npm run installDocumentation
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run flow
scripts.test: npm run testJsGiven && npm run buildDocumentation
